title: Words to Rhyme with: A Rhyming Dictionary (Facts on File Writer'
description:
Words to Rhyme With lists more than 80,000 rhyming words divided into single, double, and triple rhymes. A 100-page primer gives readers the essentials of poetic technique, and a glossary defines 9,000 of the most eccentric words to rhyme with. Entertaining, clever, and easy-to-use, this is the authoritative reference on rhyme.
Features include:
A "Primer of Prosody" that clearly illuminates such essentials of poetic technique as rhyme scheme, meter, and the various poetic forms
A glossary of abstruse words, so that when readers see a word in the rhyming list, they can flip to the back of the book to determine its meaning.
